description.title: Hotel description
description.content:
A stay at Hotel El Palace Barcelona places you in the heart of Barcelona, within a 10-minute walk of Plaça de Catalunya and La Rambla.

This luxury hotel is 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Passeig de Gràcia and 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Palau de la Música Catalana.
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials.

You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a 24-hour fitness center.

This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge).
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service.

Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.
Featured amenities include complimentary wired internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.

A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 120 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and flat-screen televisions.

Your bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wired and wireless internet access is available.

Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

values.content: Children are welcome at this hotel.

values.title: 2 years old and over
values.content: Children can use extra beds for an additional charge of EUR 100.0.

values.title: 2 years old and under
values.content: Children can use extra beds for free.

values.title: 11 years old and under
values.content: For each room, 1 child can use existing beds for free.

values.title: From 12 to 17 years old
values.content: For each room, 1 child can use existing beds for an additional charge of EUR 100.0.

Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. The name on the credit card used for the booking should correspond to the guest staying at the property.

values.title: The hotel accepts the following payment methods:

explanations.title: HOW OUR SUMMARY OF REVIEWS WORKS
explanations.content:
We analyze user reviews from dozens of travel websites and we generate a summary of all of them so that you can see at a glance the assessment made by the guests of this hotel.
In this way, you don't need to invest time in reading hundreds of reviews one by one to extract your own conclusions: we give them to you ready-made!

explanations.title: TRUE REVIEWS
explanations.content: All the analyzed reviews come from travel websites that allow reviews to be written only by those users who have made a booking and stayed at the hotel.
